MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Stoke on Trent affecting properties in Audley Road, Mere Lake Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:07PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:00PM on 18th April 2021.
